languages.text: "Каждая трещина была мала, но вместе они раскололи твердыню надежд, живших во мне".
"Every crack was small, but together they shattered the bastion of hopes living within me."
languages.original_text: "Каждая трещина была мала, но вместе они раскололи твердыню надежд, живших во мне".

traits.locale_text: "Every crack was small, but together they shattered the bastion of hopes living within me."
"Every crack was small, but together they shattered the bastion of hopes living within me."
"Every crack was small, but together they shattered the bastion of hopes living within me."
"Every crack was small, but together they shattered the bastion of hopes living within me."

languages.text: «Cada grieta individual era pequeña, pero juntas acabaron con el bastión de mis ilusiones».
languages.original_text: "Every crack was small, but together they shattered the bastion of hopes living within me."

traits.locale_text: «Cada grieta individual era pequeña, pero juntas acabaron con el bastión de mis ilusiones».

languages.text: “每条裂缝都微不足道，但它们合在一起，击垮了我心中希望的堡垒。”
languages.original_text: "Every crack was small, but together they shattered the bastion of hopes living within me."

traits.locale_text: “每条裂缝都微不足道，但它们合在一起，击垮了我心中希望的堡垒。”

languages.text: 「ひとつひとつの亀裂は小さかったが、それがひとつになって俺の中に生きていた希望の砦を打ち砕いたんだ」
languages.original_text: "Every crack was small, but together they shattered the bastion of hopes living within me."

traits.locale_text: 「ひとつひとつの亀裂は小さかったが、それがひとつになって俺の中に生きていた希望の砦を打ち砕いたんだ」

languages.text: « Toutes ces fêlures, si petites soient-elles, se sont conjuguées pour briser le bastion des espoirs qui vivaient en moi. »
languages.original_text: "Every crack was small, but together they shattered the bastion of hopes living within me."

traits.locale_text: « Toutes ces fêlures, si petites soient-elles, se sont conjuguées pour briser le bastion des espoirs qui vivaient en moi. »

languages.text: "Jeder Riss war klein, doch gemeinsam zertrümmerten sie die Bastion der Hoffnungen in mir."
languages.original_text: "Every crack was small, but together they shattered the bastion of hopes living within me."

traits.locale_text: "Jeder Riss war klein, doch gemeinsam zertrümmerten sie die Bastion der Hoffnungen in mir."

languages.original_text: "Every crack was small, but together they shattered the bastion of hopes living within me."

languages.text: "Yarıklar küçüktü ama birlik olup içimde yaşayan tüm umut kalelerini yıktılar."
languages.original_text: "Every crack was small, but together they shattered the bastion of hopes living within me."

traits.locale_text: "Yarıklar küçüktü ama birlik olup içimde yaşayan tüm umut kalelerini yıktılar."
